meanings.definition: Yale: a university in New Haven, Connecticut.
meanings.sent1: I dream of attending Yale one day.
meanings.sent2: Many students aspire to study at Yale.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bookworm go to Yale? To get smarter!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library at Yale, full of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The grand architecture of Yale leaves a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: Yale: a type of lock with a keyhole in the knob.
meanings.sent1: He used a Yale to secure his front door.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to lock the door with the Yale before leaving.
meanings.sent3: Why did the key feel lonely? It missed its Yale friend!
meanings.sent4: The Yale on the door guarded their secrets like a loyal sentinel.
meanings.sent5: The click of the Yale locking echoed through the hallway.
